seed_pair.target: I wanted her to know that I liked her book.
seed_pair.known: Quería que ella supiera que me gustó su libro.

S0336: No creo que pueda abrir la puerta.
I don't think that she can open the door.
S0337: Do you think that he can continue to play?
S0339: No, pienso que se ha lastimado bastante mal.
No I think he's hurt himself quite badly.
S0340: Sí, estoy seguro que va a estar bien.
Yes I'm sure he's going to be okay.
S0341: I met someone a few days ago.
Conocí a alguien hace unos días.
S0342: I met someone who said something.
Conocí a alguien que dijo algo.
S0343: Who said that she's worried about the economy.
Que dijo que está preocupada por la economía.
S0344: Who said that he's happy to help you.
Que dijo que está contento de ayudarte.
S0345: Who said that he's not ready to leave yet.
Que dijo que no está preparado para irse todavía.

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs as full sentence examples showing patterns and vocabulary
_instructions.overgeneration: Generate 12-15 phrases knowing some may be filtered by GATE validation
_instructions.quality: Semantic meaning + syntactic correctness + pedagogical value
_instructions.format: Array format: ["English phrase", "Spanish phrase", null, lego_count]
